mapper.select: SELECT O.CLASS_NUM , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_SDATE , CLASS_EDATE , CLASS_ENTER , CLASS_STATUS , CI.TEACHER_NUM , (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = T.MEMBER_ID WHERE TEACHER_NUM = CI.TEACHER_NUM) AS TEACHER_NAME , MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN OPERATOR O ON M.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN CLASS_INFO CI ON O.CLASS_NUM = CI.CLASS_NUM WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CLASS_EDATE > NOW()

SELECT CLASS_NUM , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_PAYMENT , CLASS_PERSONNEL , CLASS_SDATE , CLASS_EDATE , CLASS_STATUS , CI.TEACHER_NUM , MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_ID FROM CLASS_INFO CI INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON CI.TEACHER_NUM = T.TEACHER_NUM INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE CLASS_EDATE >= NOW() ORDER BY CLASS_NUM DESC

SELECT CLASS_NUM , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_SDATE , CLASS_EDATE , CLASS_ENTER , CLASS_STATUS , CI.TEACHER_NUM , (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = T.MEMBER_ID WHERE TEACHER_NUM = CI.TEACHER_NUM) AS TEACHER_NAME FROM CLASS_INFO CI INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON T.TEACHER_NUM = CI.TEACHER_NUM WHERE CI.CLASS_NUM = #{classNum}
